string.value: While investigating #b#m103000000##k, you were introduced to #p1052103#, who has a good nose. Talk to #b#p1052103##k.

#p1052103# got angry saying that while the thieves in #m103000000# may be a bit sneaky they are not the type to steal things. She says, to regain the honor of Kerning City, she will catch the thief herself... Looks like you can leave this investigation to #p1052103#. Tell #p1061005# as much and ask him to wait.
